purpose: Revaa exists to transform period care from a source of environmental guilt and health concerns into an empowering act of self-care and planetary stewardship. We prove that honoring your body and protecting the earth are one and the same.
mission: To make sustainable, body-safe period care accessible to all menstruators while reducing global menstrual waste and destigmatizing menstrual health conversations.
vision: A world where every period is a positive force—for personal wellness, environmental health, and social change. Where menstruation is celebrated, not hidden, and where sustainable choices are the norm, not the exception.
values: Authenticity: Transparent about ingredients, processes, and impact—no greenwashing
Empowerment: Education and community over shame and secrecy
Sustainability: True environmental responsibility from product to packaging
Inclusivity: Welcoming all menstruators regardless of gender identity
Innovation: Continuous improvement in performance and sustainability
Accessibility: Premium quality without premium-only pricing
positioning: Revaa is the conscious choice for modern menstruators who refuse to compromise between personal wellness and planetary health. We deliver premium, sustainable period care that honors both body and earth.

voiceAndTone.voice: Conversational yet informed, warm yet professional, empowering yet humble

keyMessages: Your Period, Reimagined - Transform the period experience into self-care and environmental impact
Sustainable Doesn't Mean Sacrifice - Premium performance meets environmental responsibility
Clean Care for Your Most Intimate Wellness - Organic, toxin-free materials for long-term health
Every Period is a Vote for the Planet - Each product prevents waste and supports equity
Period Positivity Starts Here - Breaking taboos through education and celebration
differentiators: Complete Biodegradability (products AND packaging within 90-180 days)
Price Accessibility (premium quality at mid-market pricing)
Transparency & Certification (full ingredient disclosure, third-party verified)
Performance Innovation (AI-powered absorbency in organic materials)
Social Impact Integration (1-for-1 model + advocacy + environmental restoration)
